did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle:
New York State College of Veterinary Medicine College Council records,
1897-1932

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York State College of Veterinary Medicine College Council.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Two bound volumes containing the records of the New York State College of Veterinary Medicine College Council from 1897-1932.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The College Council was established in 1897 for the "making of rules and ordinances for the administration of the State Veterinary College and for the distribution...of the funds thereof." The original Council consisted of the University President, the Treasurer and Director of the College and two members of the faculty.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Two bound volumes containing the records of the New York State College of Veterinary Medicine College Council from 1897-1932.
